content: Indeed, it does seem to match! Sorry for the noise.
gspr has marked this topic as resolved.

(It would be nice if there was a specification for how the .crate is actually meant to be formed though! It would be very useful to know how to produce a compliant foo.crate independently of "whatever Cargo does")
Right now, crates aren't guaranteed reproducible when built twice from the same source, and the checksum needs to match whatever file was in the index.
